'''Sara Zwangobani''' is an Australian actress. She has portrayed the original [[Harfoots|Harfoot]] character [[Marigold Brandyfoot]] in Amazon's ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' series.<ref>{{webcite|author=The Lord of the Rings on Prime|articleurl=https://twitter.com/LOTRonPrime/status/1534982566448533504|articlename=Sara Zwangobani is Marigold Brandyfoot. #LOTRROP|dated=9 June 2022|website=[https://twitter.com Twitter]|accessed=5 February 2023}}</ref>
